flawed_nl_solution:
72/1 players have averaged 1 goal a game because 24 x (1/3) = <<24*(1/3)=72/1>>72/1
These players average a total of 72 goals a game because 72/1 x 1 = <<72/1*1=72>>72
These players have scored 1080 goals because 72/1 x 15 = <<72/1*15=1080>>1080
The remaining players have scored -930 total goals because 150 - 1080 = <<150-1080=-930>>-930
#### -930

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 8, not 72/1. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
